channel.title: Other people cant login
channel.description: Well im new to the rsps world and i watched some tutorials and set my utorrent/no-ip up and everything but when my friends try to connect it says "No Response From Server, Please Try To Use Different World" Any Ideas?

item.title: Other people cant login
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

Ya idk can u help?

Read full topic

item.title: Other people cant login
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

This is most likely because you haven’t added port exceptions to your Computer’s firewall. When they get the no response message, that means something is blocking them from connecting, which usually is messaged when someone is IP banned. If you don’t know how to add port exceptions to your firewall, just ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Other people cant login
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:2, topic:428885”]utorrent is not a good way to portforward, try portforwarding on your router, or changing the ip in the client to your no-ip and release it to them or teamviewer?[/quote] I Port fowarded my router and all that and it still says the same thing i changed server = to my no-ip in the client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Other people cant login

item.description:
@axecutor9090 wrote:

Did you set the ipaddress in the client form the Set 127.0.0.1 to your no-ip?
